message.body: Saturday's looking like rain and snow...any ideas for an indoor location or alternate date? :-(
We could get a hotel room.. Or do you have a friends house? Or something like that?
I just called melissa at cbi and she said there's a suite open that we can use! Yay! So unless it miraculously clears up, does 3 at centre bridge inn work for you?
Let's hope it clears up! Lol
Ok.. Let me think about time.. 3 should still work it's just a bit of a drive for me so I have to consider time
Okay, we could make it a little later or earlier too depending on what works for you...my appts should be done with plenty of time before, and I don't have anything after
Grrrr I want them outside lol they would be so much cooler :p
Me toooo!! Is there any way we can set up a tarp and a fire?? Hahahaha
Tarp? Lol
....wait, *could* we set up a fire??
Oh hahah yeah :-)
For the rain? Haha
Lets do it rain or shine., im committed.. We can do really cool pics with umbrella and tree cover
Absolutely
Bring a robe and a jacket and we will keep you covered most of it ;)
Okay! Yes! I might have to huddle in a blanket every few minutes, but we will make it work!
So we will meet at the Exxon??
Haha I just think your pics will b cooler outside :)
We can run back to the car and warm up in between :)
Will do! And yes, original meeting time and place. I'll let Melissa know we won't be crashing the cbi :-)
Agreed! I think they just wouldn't be the same indoors..and would have a higher chance of being totally cheesy. I'm going to bring a huge thermos of something hot haha
Yeah good idea and some hand Warmers :p bring some sneakers too so we can walk into the woods
Maybe bring a cool blanket and we wrap you in it for some cool pics in the woods?.
Ooh good idea, I have one that'll be perfect! And yes, I will bring all the warm things haha :-)
Can't wait!
3 works at Exxon :)
Great! Me too! I'm glad you got me pumped for it, I was getting a little grumpy!
Lol no grumpy! Happy only :p
Bring a sheet too.. That could be sexy. And I chair like a wooden chair if you can :)
Just thinking :)
Okay! I'm not sure how photogenic my chairs will be but I'll bring one just in case haha
Hey Faye.. Got your call but couldn't answer,. I have no service here lol can't even load your voicemail- sorry lol, what's up?
It's okay! My salon cancelled on me!! Complete last minute and I am at a loss as to what to do.
I was supposed to have my hair and makeup trials before the shoot...and now I have no salon
Ok.. Well we can still do it or we can reschedule.. Up to you

What is your schedule like over the next few weeks? A friend of mine is making some calls to see if I can get appts in dc tomorrow morning, but I'm not sure what the verdict is yet. Would you be able to switch to next weekend? After that I'm traveling e
Next Friday afternoon is my only opening
Otherwise we will have to do may

Okay, let's stick to the original plan for tomorrow. I got an early morning appt down here, so I can make it up to lebanon by 3 still, all dolled up! Sorry for all the back and forth, what a nightmare!
No biggie! Sorry for the stress for you
Thanks, hopefully it'll be smooth sailing from now on! :-)
Pretty sure we're insane. ..this is going to be epic!
Lol def!!
It's actually not that cold.. Considering its really freaky snowing its 44 degrees
Definitely try
Hahaha yeah I actually prefer the snow to rain
True!
Journey completed! Thanks for the awesome shoot, I couldn't have made it through the cold without your encouragement! :-)
How do you like the sneak peek? :-)
Love it!! Thanks for putting it together so quickly! I love the blanket ones and the mermaid-esque one...and the sassy woods ones..ah I can never pick a favorite! Haha :-)
That's a good problem to have :)
True! First world problems :-) I hope this week goes much better for you! ;-)
Same to you!
